title: Is there anyway i can restore my permanent ban?
body:
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/euw/54677288/Ok%20then%20not#/profile

I was playing game and afterwards i saw i had lower priority queue. i was like okay, its reasonable. half way through my queue about 13 minutes. i got a message that my account got banned. at first thought i was like its probaly 14 days+ because i had 1 ban recently. but when i logged in it stated that my account got permantly banned. 

i was pretty shocked and got pretty mad ( payed €405,00 and i started playing around Season 2 on my friends account. made my own in late season 3, so thats quite some years) i've experienced alot of bans a couple years ago since i had problems with my family and other personal problems.

i got banned for being toxic. i do agree that im pretty toxic sometimes, but i just want to win in ranked. sometimes i would get 1/2 afks and get reported cause im being mad cause im losing my promos for the 4th time in a row. 

and its not that im always toxic cause i've made about 100+ friends in the time i played league of legends. like i would carry a game get honored  and then u see a friend request popping up and play some duo queue with them. i even got a red honor mark in loading screen a couple of years ago. 
I've also recruited alot of friends of mine to league of legends (about 9)  cause i wanted to play league with my friends and stuff.

Anyways if there is no way my account is getting unbanned i can understand.

P.S. Sorry for my last hate posts, i was kinda mad.

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Locking this necro.

Lol Urgot support, damn. That's rough. That shit pisses me off, but I have the common sense to not call him a retard. That's just dumb. Solves nothing, you're still mad, and now your account is at risk of a ban. And that's what you got... perma ban. Wise up if you decide to make a new account. You may be used to insulting people to make yourself feel better, but in Rito land, it is a big no-no and you knew this but did it anyways. Can't really say I feel bad for ya, but hey, good luck on your next account.

HEY !! Don't go dissing off-META supports.

I played Urgot support against an assassin comp back in the days before his rework.

I'm sure If I played a bit more new Urgot I would find a comp that would fit New Urgot Support.
Hahaha sorry xD I love me some Urgot, both the old one and new one. I suppose you could make it work.
The old passive of -12% damage for anyone you'd hit was great against assassins.

-15% to be correct.

Got an awesome ult to peel, Armor shred with E (and cleaver if I decide to get it), 6 secs to proc a point and click slow and can proc it on multiple targets, and a pretty whacky base dmg on Q (death is the best CC) that people always underestimate.

Sad thing is that people at my ELO have no idea what he does and the credit often goes unseen. 

But hey, I know I do and I win games with it.

- "The unseen blade is the deadliest". - said by one of the picks that Old Urgot counters the most.

Well it wasnt really about the fact he played urgot, first of all i was toplane but adc took mundo and went top without my permission. then urgot was like constant taunting me stealing farm and stuff. idk that pisses me off and make me rage.
New account? if i were too make a new account. i would just afk people out of rage my account got banned but dw. im not wasting my time for that.

There isn't any way to restore a permanently banned account yet.

I'm sorry, you got warnings, but you continued to be toxic, so I doubt riot is going to do anything for you, regardless of the money you spent on that game.

> [{quoted}](name=Winek Chan,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:08:40.348+0000)
>
> There isn't any way to restore a permanently banned account yet.
> 
> I'm sorry, you got warnings, but you continued to be toxic, so I doubt riot is going to do anything for you, regardless of the money you spent on that game.

Don't be sorry.  Be glad that you won't have teammates like him who will glady rage at you and could care less.  

Reading  posts like this encourages me to report toxic players like him in game.  I like reading the QQ and "please lift my ban, I will reform".  Best one is "please have mercy because i spent â‚¬405,00 on the game".   Riot loves the last one.

They deserve their ban, yes, but that doesn't mean you need to be more aggressive. Would you enjoy being bashed over like this if it was you instead?

Thought so. So just take a chill pill, the way you act probably tilt the OP even more. If you were in a game, it'd be a reportable offense, so think of it :|

> [{quoted}](name=Winek Chan,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:20:34.509+0000)
>
> They deserve their ban, yes, but that doesn't mean you need to be more aggressive. Would you enjoy being bashed over like this if it was you instead?
> 
> Thought so. So just take a chill pill, the way you act probably tilt the OP even more. If you were in a game, it'd be a reportable offense, so think of it :|

Winek Chan, I apologize  if you took it that way.  I would never do this  in-game.  I will cease my words as of right now. I can see that I am absolutely being overly aggressive.  I just wanted to express my gratitude towards Riot for OP's  ban.  That's  all.

I also really hate playing with toxic players and I'm glad if they are getting banned.

I'm just trying to keep it harmonious around here, thanks for understanding <3

> [{quoted}](name=Winek Chan,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:47:52.513+0000)
>
> I also really hate playing with toxic players and I'm glad if they are getting banned.
> 
> I'm just trying to keep it harmonious around here, thanks for understanding <3

:)

Dude, i've been reading ur posts. but ur toxic too? u dont even know why i'd rage? u think i rage at someone if they ks me? no, u think i rage at someone if they die? no, i rage when im losing games because of trolls afks and inters.

> [{quoted}](name=Ok then not,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:21:00.194+0000)
>
> Dude, i've been reading ur posts. but ur toxic too? u dont even know why i'd rage? u think i rage at someone if they ks me? no, u think i rage at someone if they die? no, i rage when im losing games because of trolls afks and inters.

I get  hella  mad and upset.  I'm just as emotional as you are.  The difference is that I don't act on it and become toxic in game.

The ultimate  truth is, majority of league players enjoy the fact that you are banned.  I personally am happy that you spent all that money only to have your account  banned.  

Sweet sweet justice. Thanks  Riot. 

That's another  reason why I like reading posts in "PLayer Behavior".  Everyday, there's at least one player QQ about their account being banned.  They never show chat logs or any proof for their  reason they shoulnd't be banned.  Its always "I wasn't  being toxic", "I was defending myself", "I was saracstic with a friend"... etc etc etc. 

Good times.

I'm glad Riot got rid of  someone as toxic as you.  You try to  reason why you were toxic in 80% of your  post, giving excuse after excuse  Every player in league goes what you go through but we don't rage on our teammates and say toxic things. 

LOL "sorry for the hate posts"... give me a break, at least own up to your anger issues.

Try to calm the hell down, I'm sick of seeing these aggressive/toxic posts here.
You're not really acting any better than him, just letting yourself go because there aren't concrete rules on the board, so take a chill now.

> [{quoted}](name=Winek Chan,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:12:25.632+0000)
>
> Try to calm the hell down, I'm sick of seeing these aggressive/toxic posts here.
> You're not really acting any better than him, just letting yourself go because there aren't concrete rules on the board, so take a chill now.

ugh no.  yes i'm aggressive but not toxic.  i'm saying what everybody is thinking.
Would u mind explaining me the difference between aggressive and toxic? i bet u can't.

> [{quoted}](name=Ok then not,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:22:59.179+0000)
>
> Would u mind explaining me the difference between aggressive and toxic? i bet u can't.

this post is aggressive, toxic is yelling at people, using words that are expletives toward people, some times if you just say the expletive like F*** in chat when you did something wrong that is alright, just don't do it often and don't do it towards people

> [{quoted}](name=Ok then not,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:22:59.179+0000)
>
> Would u mind explaining me the difference between aggressive and toxic? i bet u can't.

Its  subjective.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadowynn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:19:40.371+0000)
>
> ugh no.  yes i'm aggressive but not toxic.  i'm saying what everybody is thinking.

One more  thing.  I'm no where near acting like him. I don't rage at my teammates during the  game. Even if a fellow teammate is playing poorly, i am not going to berate him.  I don't argue back with toxic  players like OP and just mute them, and then take SS and report them after game. All the while, playing my A game because I want to win without being bothered by toxic players like OP.

I understand why you hate  seeing toxic  posts.  But what else are we going to reply to OP's post.  "I hope you reform and not get banned next time". Is that what you want to see.  

Another truth is... these banned players don't give a RATS FUCK about anyone in the community.  They are doing their absolute best to get their banned accounts lifted so they can play.  In doing so, we get the "im sorry I will reform and never be toxic again".  You, me,  OP and everyone who plays league of legends gets tilted (even enraged sometimes), but its players like you and me that don't rage back and report the toxicity within riot's rule.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadowynn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:08:23.425+0000)
>
> I'm glad Riot got rid of  someone as toxic as you.  You try to  reason why you were toxic in 80% of your  post, giving excuse after excuse  Every fuckin player in league goes what you go through but we don't rage on our teammates and say stupid shit. 
> 
> LOL "sorry for the hate posts"... give me a break, at least own up to your anger issues.

don't cross that toxic line ;). but yea i would have said the same just with less expletives

> [{quoted}](name=mnjk78lgm,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eM35u03x,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-18T23:10:48.475+0000)
>
> don't cross that toxic line ;). but yea i would have said the same just with less expletives

MNJK78LGM.... You are absolutely right brotha.  I almost stooped to OP's level (not near close).  Thanks for face checking me! I editted my original post.

"payed â‚¬405,00..."   Thats even more of an incentive to play within the rules so that you won't get  banned.  Yeah you should be upset, upset at YOURSELF.  You've gotten banned in the past and yet you still can't control your rage  urges.  So sad. 

I love it when banned people cry that they spent X dollars, as if thats  a reason why Riot should lift their ban.
It was a reason to get mad about. you dont understand because you let your mom pay for rp.
